author: cnbc.com
title: Moro Corporation Announces Appointment of Greta L. Kessler as a Director
text:
WAYNE, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Moro Corporation (OTC: MRCR) (the “Company”), a construction products and services company, today announced the Board of Directors has appointed Greta L. Kessler to serve as a Director. The announcement was made by David W. Menard, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Company.
Greta L. Kessler became a Director of the Company in May 2017. Ms. Kessler has 20 years of Healthcare Information Technology and Quality Improvement experience. She has a passion for improvement and has been consulting for the last 8 years evaluating performance metrics. Prior to that, Ms. Kessler lent her expertise as a Product Manager handling the full life cycle software development for online Performance Improvement Modules and was a key partner in designing and developing the organization’s 10-year vision for those modules. Prior to that, she spent several years as a software developer and project manager creating complex hospital-based decision support software systems.
Ms. Kessler has a Bachelor of Arts in Organizational Management, and has earned two certificates in the field of Computer Programming.
About Moro Corporation :
Moro Corporation is a multi-subsidiary construction products and services company. Moro’s contracting subsidiaries provide electrical, structural steel, sheet metal ductwork and HVAC products and services to a variety of commercial and residential customers located in New York, Pennsylvania and Connecticut. Moro’s steel fabricating and distribution subsidiaries fabricate and distribute concrete reinforcing steel and other accessory items to a variety of contractors located in Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Connecticut, Rhode Island and Massachusetts. For additional information, visit www.morocorp.com .
For more information, contact David W. Menard, Chairman and CEO, at 484-367-0300, fax 484-367-0305, or at dmenard@morocorp.com .
